metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24999 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an invalid memory access in the function fprintf located in Error.cc in Xpdf 4.0.2. It can be triggered by sending a crafted PDF file to the pdftohtml binary, which allows a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> reproducer doesn't seem to work on poppler, marking as not-affected ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
